thread.title: China to 'fight back' against U.S. trade tariffs

title: China to 'fight back' against U.S. trade tariffs
text:
China to 'fight back' against U.S. trade tariffs 5:25pm IST - 01:49 
China warned on Friday it would fight back ''at any cost'' with fresh trade measures if the United States continues on its path of protectionism, hours after President Donald Trump threatened to slap an additional $100 billion in tariffs on Chinese goods. Kate King reports.
